contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1905 D Kirkham Contest
Kirkham Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
kirkham-contest
Kirkham, Lancashire 1st prize £15, 2nd prize £10, 3rd prize £5, 4th prize £3, 5th prize £2. March contest 1st (£2) Goodshaw, 2nd (£1) Gossage's. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 17, 2012, 3:09 p.m. Sept. 10, 2018, 9:56 a.m.
1 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Halliwell Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
2 Earlestown Viaduct William Rimmer Donizetti [arr. Round]
3 St. Annes on the Sea T. Lightbourne Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
4 Longridge Band Unknown Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
5 Eccles Borough Band R. Dennison Rossini [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Platt Bridge William Halliwell Donizetti [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Gossage Soap Works William Rimmer Donizetti [arr. Rimmer]
